mapper.select: SELECT AUTH_SQ, USER_NO, USER_TYPE, MENU_SQ, AUTH_C, AUTH_R, AUTH_U, AUTH_D FROM TB_USER_AUTH WHERE USER_TYPE = (SELECT USER_TYPE FROM TB_USER_INFO WHERE USER_SEQ = CASE(#{USER_NO} as integer));

SELECT A.MENU_SQ, (SELECT MENU_ID FROM TB_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_SQ = A.MENU_SQ) AS MENU_ID, A.USER_NO, A.USER_TYPE, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.AUTH_C = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end + CASE WHEN B.AUTH_C = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) = 0 THEN false ELSE true end AUTH_C, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.AUTH_R = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end + CASE WHEN B.AUTH_R = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) = 0 THEN false ELSE true end AUTH_R, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.AUTH_U = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end + CASE WHEN B.AUTH_U = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) = 0 THEN false ELSE true end AUTH_U, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.AUTH_D = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end + CASE WHEN B.AUTH_D = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) = 0 THEN false ELSE true end AUTH_D FROM ( SELECT MENU_SQ, USER_NO, USER_TYPE, AUTH_C, AUTH_R, AUTH_U, AUTH_D FROM TB_USER_AUTH WHERE USER_TYPE = (SELECT USER_TYPE FROM TB_USER_INFO WHERE USER_SEQ = CAST(#{USER_NO} as integer)) ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MENU_SQ, USER_NO, USER_TYPE, AUTH_C, AUTH_R, AUTH_U, AUTH_D FROM TB_USER_AUTH WHERE USER_NO = CAST(#{USER_NO} as integer) ) B ON A.MENU_SQ = B.MENU_SQ WHERE A.MENU_SQ = (SELECT MENU_SQ FROM TB_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_ID = #{MENU_ID})
